effects.effect: Regenerates 1HP every turn whilst this weapon is equipped. Has to be equiped before the turn begins.
Once per long rest, you can reload without the cost of an action point
You can choose how to split the damage delt between two seperate enemies in view. Only roll attack once
Weapon can be used twice, once on attack and once as a bonus
Once per long rest, you can bypass an enemy's SC or AC and roll damage with this gun
You can still roll for elemental attack even if your normal attack misses
Elemental damage can spread to all enemies in a 10ft radius. For all enemies in the vicinity, make an elemental attack roll.
On a critical hit, instead of double damage, the gun can fire all available ammo at once, where each ammo has a seperate damage rolled
On a successfull hit, your bullet can ricochet to a enemy 10ft away. Roll a new attack roll for this. Can be chained between enemies
